courses.title: Portrait Photography Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the art of portrait photography with professional lighting techniques, composition rules, and posing guidance for stunning people photography.

courses.title: Landscape Photography for Beginners
courses.description: Capture breathtaking landscapes and natural beauty with essential techniques for outdoor photography, golden hour shooting, and composition mastery.

courses.title: Advanced Street Photography
courses.description: Develop your eye for candid moments and urban storytelling with advanced street photography techniques and ethical shooting practices.

courses.title: Wildlife Photography Mastery
courses.description: Learn to capture stunning wildlife images with telephoto techniques, animal behavior understanding, and field photography skills.

courses.title: Macro Photography Techniques
courses.description: Explore the miniature world through macro photography, mastering close-up techniques, focus stacking, and specialized equipment usage.

courses.title: Photography Post-Processing Mastery
courses.description: Transform your raw images into stunning works of art using Adobe Lightroom and Photoshop with professional editing workflows.

courses.title: Commercial Photography Essentials
courses.description: Master product photography, fashion shoots, and commercial assignments with studio lighting, client management, and business skills.

courses.title: Night and Astrophotography
courses.description: Capture the beauty of the night sky and low-light environments with long exposure techniques, star trails, and Milky Way photography.

courses.title: Photography History and Theory
courses.description: Explore the evolution of photography from its inception to digital age, studying influential photographers and iconic movements.

courses.title: Wedding Photography Complete Guide
courses.description: Master the art of wedding photography with emotion-capturing techniques, timeline management, and client relationship skills.
